title: Bloomberg Markets: Ark's Wood on `Innovation Platforms'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ark's Wood on `Innovation Platforms'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Catherine Wood CEO and Chief Investment Officer ARK Investment Management Discussing Israel's leadership in tech entrepreneurship and launching a new ETF that will focus on Israel Innovative Technology.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
